title: Luxury Five Bed House for Sale in Ethul Kotte
details:
Meticulously maintained luxury house offering extensive living space along with five bedrooms and six bathrooms. The house features a spacious living & dining area, separate pantry and wet kitchen, rooftop terrace and landscaped garden.

The master bedroom sits on the 1st floor, thoughtfully designed with plenty of closet space and a spacious master bathroom including a jacuzzi and rain shower. Additionally there are two more bedrooms on the 1st floor, one bedroom on the 2nd floor and a guest bedroom on the ground floor. A well configured, beautifully designed family house in a quiet residential neighborhood.

- Five spacious bedrooms. All bedrooms include attached bathrooms.
- Bedrooms and living area equipped with A/C.
- Separate pantry and wet kitchen both equipped with fitted cupboards.
- Landscaped garden with outdoor veranda.
- Rooftop terrace equipped with sitting area, gym & washroom.
- Solar powered water heating system.
- Maids room & bathroom and driver’s room & bathroom.
- Electric roller garage door with four parking spaces.
- Three phase electricity.

Price negotiable upon inspection. Viewings can be arranged by appointment only.
